subject: Re: More on that comet or asteroid,

full_text:
Yeah, wierd how this stuff is going on. Like his bible quote at the end, and I have to ask, how does that translate into ..and they all lived happily ever after, as most of the jerkweeds proclaiming how great everything will be in 2013 say?

 No doubt someone find out it's another hoax. 

F-S
